value:
Simply splendid, Reinhardt. Beautiful
footwork. A dance befitting a knight
of Friege.

For the ball, we don our finest.
I do wonder, however, if dressing
for the battlefield befits me better.

I expect that, as members of the
royal family, Princess Sharena and
Prince Alfonse are schooled in dance.

Askr is home to such beautiful
music... It lightens my step.

Dreaming of sharing a dance, I once
practiced my steps so intently, with
a specific partner in mind...

I am Ishtar, visiting from
$Nf's castle. Shall
we take a turn on the floor?

Behold the dance of the Goddess
of Thunder!

I must allow the music to
flow through my heart.
I hesitated to step, didn't I?

I will show you an even more
elegant dance—one that befits
the Goddess of Thunder.

I am Ishtar, of Friege. I have some
small mastery of dancing. You are
welcome to confirm that.

How was that? Are you satisfied
with my dancing?$k$pIf I concentrate, everything but the
dance fades...$k$pI feel as if a bolt of lightning is
coursing through my body, filling
me with vigor.$k$pI do not dance to escape my sadness.
Everything I do is with the aim of
moving forward.$k$pI will continue on my path, dancing
without cessation, seeking the future.
それっ
Yes
ああっ…
Oh no...!
Let us dance.
Move with grace.
Like this?
Take my hand.
Is it over already...?
(Sigh after dancing maybe?)
Can you continue?
The Thunder Goddess's blessing.
Do you find this dress unusual? ... I too find it well suited for dancing.
I haven't been in such good spirits for a very long time.
In days gone by, my brother was often my dance partner... I remember those days fondly.
Oh, Lord Julius... Just this once, I'd like to put it all behind us...
It's such a happy time — let's celebrate. Join me for a turn around the dance floor, won't you?
Beautiful.
And then...
I'll show you.
